author: Tony A. SÃ¦le [oystein@globalit.no]
param:
{integer} [season]
  The season to show matches for.
description:
Either season or tournament must be specified.
  Gameweek can be used in either use-case.
 
  This widget will show a list of matches for one gameweek in a collection
  of matches. Each matches shows a home and away team. Depending on whether
  the match has started or not, a score or a start time will be displayed.
name: Fixtures
